Text:
Weird...
I downloaded it and ran the attached SFV-file to check if all the files were there, only tracks 7, 11 and 13 to 17 checked out OK, the rest showed missing checksums but they sound alright...
It's not a pure live album, there's comments of the songs by the band, sometimes right in the middle of the song, which is annoying...
But Chris Martin is quite the comedian, his talking inbetween songs is hilarious. Thanks to Chris, i now know that "A Rush Of Blood To The Head" sold OVER 200 copies!!! :-D
That's not bad...
